# Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for Illumina MiSeq Maintenance Contract

## Overview
The Government of Canada intends to enter into a contract for the maintenance of Illumina MiSeq DNA sequencing equipment. This Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is a preliminary notice to the supplier community that the government intends to award the contract to a pre-identified supplier, Illumina Canada UlC.

## Contract Details
- **Contract Title:** ACAN – Illumina MiSeq Maintenance Contract
- **Contract Number:** PW-22-01016078
- **Contract Description:** The contract is for a three (3) year silver-level maintenance service covering all parts, labor, and travel for the DNA sequencing equipment at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada Saskatoon Research and Development Centre.
- **Estimated Value:** $55,939.21 CAD (including applicable taxes)
- **Contract Period:** January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2025

## Pre-identified Supplier
The pre-identified supplier for this contract is Illumina Canada UlC. As the original instrument manufacturer and service provider, Illumina Canada UlC is the sole authorized entity to maintain, repair, and calibrate the Illumina MiSeq DNA sequencing equipment.

## Requirements for Statement of Capabilities
Suppliers interested in bidding on this contract must submit a Statement of Capabilities that demonstrates their ability to meet the following requirements:

- Be an authorized Illumina MiSeq dealer certified to maintain, repair, and calibrate Illumina DNA sequencing equipment.

## Submission Guidelines
Suppliers can submit their Statement of Capabilities by email to Desta Kissack, Senior Contracting Officer, at desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca. The submission deadline is December 21, 2022, at 2:00 pm CST. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements and include the Solicitation Number, Name of Contracting Authority, and closing date of the ACAN.

## Note
The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. If no supplier submits a Statement of Capabilities that meets the requirements, the Contracting Officer may proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier. However, if a Statement of Capabilities is received, the Contracting Officer will proceed to a full tendering process.
